# Linear model by core infiniband

```{r}
time = c(0.2,0.23,0.22,0.2,0.2,0.2,0.24,0.24,0.32,0.34,0.4,0.49,0.75,1.13,1.87,2.95,4.73,8.06,14.45,12.65,22.34,50.87,138.46,298.74)
bytes = c(0,1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,16384,32768,65536,131072,262144,524288,1048576,2097152,4194304)

time <- time * 10**-6
df <- data.frame(time, bytes)
df
```

```{r}
lm1 <- lm(time ~ bytes,data=df)
summary(lm1)
```

```{r}
(lm1$coefficients[2]**-1)*10**-6   #giga

```
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
df2 <- df %>% slice(1:8)
lm2 <- lm(time ~ bytes,data=df2)
summary(lm2)
```


```{r}
df3 <- df %>% slice(19:24)
lm3 <- lm(time ~ bytes,data=df3)
summary(lm3)
```


```{r}
(lm3$coefficients[2]**-1)*10**-6  #giga
```
